resources.string:
You are put in the shoes of an apprentice in the bomb defusal squad of the Special Air Service(SAS). 
 You have to use your knowledge and skills to predict the potential locations of bombs; every error will increase the number of scans. 
 You must attempt to locate and defuse all bombs in fewest number of scans possible. 
 Clicking on an already-found bomb will result in a scan as well, 
 as you will attempt to use the scanning tools to survey the row and column to find the rest of the bombs.
Game Authored by Ahmad As Sami

Project Idea: CMPT 276 https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/bfraser/grav-cms/cmpt276/home 
 Opt Image:https://www.shutterstock.com/video/clip-1049958070-technology-concept---animation-cogs-gears-on
 Background Image: Ironman HUD : https://www.pinterest.ca/pin/416794140491747770
Congratulations! You are a true hero to this world.
Top Scan Score For Current Config:%1$d
Top Defuse Score For Board 4x6(any number of bombs): %1$d
Top Defuse Score For Board 5x10(any number of bombs): %1$d
Top Defuse Score For Board 6x15(any number of bombs): %1$d
